column1: Learned High Court Judge of Panadura by his judgment dated 19.12.2019,
has found the 1st, 2nd and 3rd accused-appellants guilty to the 1st, 2nd and
3rd counts preferred against them and not guilty to the 4th and 5th counts.
sentenced to death for the 2nd count; fined and jailed for the 1st and 3rd
counts. The 4th and 5th accused have been found not guilty and acquitted
from all the counts preferred against them.
